satuhearty

Where Technology meets love.

We've got what you need!

We are a web design company that focuses on building beautiful, elegant and fast wedding websites. Satuhearty was founded on October 16th, 2016 in Boston, MA.

Features For Your Wedding Website

Personalized wedding websites

Wedding cards are cool. Wedding websites are cooler.

Responsive web design

Supports all platforms.

Social Sharing

Include any social platforms of your preference.

Maps Navigation

Make sure your attendees don't get lost.

RSVP

Attendees can send RSVPs directly to your email.

Registry

So people can get you the right presents.

Email Invitation

Keep track of who you have or have not invited.

Made with Love

You have to make your websites with love these days!
